thread.title: Marc Jacobs, Carolina Herrera outlets to open at Sawgrass Mills
thread.title_full: Marc Jacobs, Carolina Herrera outlets to open at Sawgrass Mills - Sun Sentinel

author: Miriam Valverde
title: Marc Jacobs, Carolina Herrera outlets to open at Sawgrass Mills
text:
A series of retailers are slated to open their first South Florida posts this holiday season at the expanded Colonnade Outlets at Sawgrass Mills.
Shops opening in November and December include Carolina Herrera, Helmut Lang, John Varvatos Outlet, Marc Jacobs, Rag & Bone, Tod's, Alexis Bittar, Ted Baker London and Vince, the Sunrise mall announced Wednesday. Exact opening dates were not disclosed.
The retailers will be the first to open for business at Sawgrass' expanded Colonnade Outlets, which offers 80,000 square feet of more retail and restaurant space. Twnety-four stores and two restaurants, including pizza restaurant Matchbox, are expected to open within the expansion.
Sawgrass also plans to debut next summer a 1,700-space parking garage next to Neiman Marcus Last Call.
Besides the Colonnade Outlets expansion, Sawgrass also plans to build Town Center at Sawgrass, a 118,000-square-foot venue with four sit-down restaurants, 25 full-price retailers and a 2,000-vehicle parking deck. That construction is expected to start in 2017 and be done by the end of 2018.
Sawgrass Mills is at 12801 W. Sunrise Blvd. in Sunrise.
mvalverde@tribune.com
